content: the cactus beanie crochet pattern starts as a simple ribbed beanie this beanie is made from a rectangle and sewn into a hat shape then all the fun details are added materials 100g worsted weight yarn i used i love this yarn in key lime small amount of pink and white yarn h/5 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors level intermediate approx finished size length child 8 teen/small adult 9 large adult 10 circumference child 17 5 teen/small adult 19 large adult 22 5
